banner.title: Instant emergency help at your fingertips
banner.description: We provide verified professionals 24/7 for plumbing, electrical work, cleaning, pet care, and other emergencies. Safe, fast, and reliable.

premiumDescription: Unlock more job requests, higher visibility, and priority support with our premium plans.

footer.description: In any emergency, time matters. Our app connects you to verified help—fast. One tap, 24/7 response, and trusted professionals—because your safety shouldn’t wait.
footer.author: @iamhervewabo

emergency.title: Emergency Help. Anytime. Anywhere.
emergency.description: Download our app to access emergency services with a single tap. Available on Android and iOS

HowITWorks.title: How It Works
steps: AI Matches You With Verified Providers
Get Emergency Support at Your Location

users.text: I booked a plumber through the app at 10:00 AM, and he arrived by 10:30. He was polite, had proper tools, and solved the issue quickly. No mess, no hassle.
users.name: Hasan, Toronto (Ontario)

users.text: My cat fell sick late at night. I used the Emergency Hero app and a certified vet came within 30 minutes. The service was professional, gentle, and caring. Highly recommended for any pet owner!
users.name: Mobin, Winnipeg (Manitoba)

users.text: I booked a deep cleaning service for my 2-bedroom flat. The cleaners arrived on time, wore masks and gloves, and cleaned every corner. Super professional!
users.name: Nur, Montreal (Quebec)
